tool_description: Given a protein structure, this tool searches the protein sequence database to retrieve the most relevant protein sequences.

required_parameters.name: protein_structure
required_parameters.description: The structural description of the protein.

required_parameters.name: database
required_parameters.description: The specific database to search for the protein sequences.

return_values.name: protein_sequence
return_values.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the protein.
